name: Calibre Web Automated - EBook Library
description: Calibre-Web Automated is an all-in-one self-hosted digital library solution that combines Calibre-Web's modern interface with Calibre's powerful features plus advanced automations. Features include automatic ingest of 27+ ebook formats, format conversion (EPUB, MOBI, AZW3, KEPUB, PDF), automatic metadata enforcement, EPUB fixing, batch editing, backups, and KOReader syncing. Default setup: bind your Calibre library to /calibre-library, books ingest folder to /cwa-book-ingest, and config to /config. Default login: Username: admin Password: admin123
short_desc: All-in-one self-hosted digital library with automatic ingest, conversion, and advanced Calibre features.
author: https://github.com/crocodilestick/
